statements: SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, biometric_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT transaction_id, biometric_id, transaction_date, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE biometric_id = 'ABCD1234' ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND transaction_type = 'withdrawal';
SELECT biometric_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY biometric_id HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, biometric_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY biometric_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'replenishment';
SELECT DISTINCT biometric_id, COUNT(DISTINCT transaction_date) AS unique_dates FROM transactions GROUP BY biometric_id;
SELECT transaction_type, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY transaction_type HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT biometric_identifier, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM payment_history WHERE payment_amount < 500 ORDER BY payment_date ASC
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions
SELECT transaction_id, biometric_identifier FROM transactions WHERE biometric_identifier LIKE '%ABC%'
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT biometric_identifier, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT biometric_identifier, COUNT(transaction_id) FROM transactions GROUP BY biometric_identifier HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) >= 5
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE payment_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC
SELECT biometric_identifier, MAX(payment_amount) FROM payment_history GROUP BY biometric_identifier
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, biometric_id, amount FROM payments WHERE biometric_id = 1001;
SELECT amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, biometric_id FROM fraud_history WHERE fraud_type = 'credit card fraud';
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM payments;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE biometric_id = 12345 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_date < '2022-01-01' AND amount >= 1000;
SELECT transactions.transaction_id, payments.payment_id, transactions.amount, payments.amount FROM transactions INNER JOIN payments ON transactions.biometric_id = payments.biometric_id;
SELECT fraud_id, fraud_type, detection_date FROM fraud_history WHERE fraud_type = 'Credit Card Fraud' ORDER BY detection_date ASC;

SELECT transaction_id, payment_id, fraud_type FROM fraud_history WHERE transaction_id IS NOT NULL AND payment_id IS NOT NULL AND fraud_type IN ('Identity Theft', 'Phishing') ORDER BY fraud_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT biometric_id, user_id, biometric_type FROM biometric_identifiers WHERE biometric_type = 'fingerprint';
SELECT transaction_id, biometric_id, is_fraud FROM fraud_detection WHERE is_fraud = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, p.payment_date FROM transactions t JOIN payments p ON t.transaction_id = p.transaction_id;
SELECT b.biometric_id, b.fingerprint_data, f.is_fraud FROM biometric_identifiers b JOIN fraud_detection f ON b.biometric_id = f.biometric_id;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, f.is_fraud FROM transactions t LEFT JOIN fraud_detection f ON t.transaction_id = f.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE biometric_id = 'XYZ123' AND amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_method FROM payments WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM biometric_data WHERE biometric_type = 'fingerprint' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, t.transaction_date, p.payment_method FROM transactions t INNER JOIN payments p ON t.transaction_id = p.transaction_id WHERE t.amount > 500 ORDER BY t.amount DESC;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(t.transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM users u LEFT JOIN transactions t ON u.biometric_id = t.biometric_id GROUP BY u.username ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT u.username, b.biometric_type, f.fraud_type FROM users u INNER JOIN biometric_data b ON u.biometric_id = b.biometric_id LEFT JOIN fraud_detection f ON u.biometric_id = f.biometric_id;
